Queue Producer for Kafka
========================

The `KafkaProducer <#crawler.queue_handler.KafkaProducer.KafkaProducer>`_ class fully implements all the necessary functions required by the :ref:`Producer Message Queue Interface <my-reference-label2>`. It is then used to facilitate the communication with a Kafka message queue in order to send back crawl job results.

.. automodule:: crawler.queue_handler.KafkaProducer
